mainHero.title: AngryDevs
mainHero.subtitle: We're not angry, we're passionate!
mainHero.description: At AngryDevs, we tackle complex IT challenges with the precision of a well-aimed bird. Based in Vancouver, our flock of expert developers turns frustrating problems into simple solutions. We may look grumpy, but we're just intensely focused on delivering top-notch results that'll make you smile.

items.title: Precision Coding Catapult
items.description: Just like launching the perfect bird, our coding process is all about precision and impact. We carefully aim our expertise at your project's pain points, ensuring maximum effectiveness with minimal fluff.

items.title: Feather-light Solutions
items.description: Our solutions may be powerful, but they're also surprisingly light. We craft elegant, efficient code that soars through challenges without weighing down your systems. It's not about being angry, it's about being smart!

features.title: Our High-Flying Tech Stack
features.subtitle: Weaponizing the latest technologies for your success!
features.description: At AngryDevs, we don't just use technologies; we wield them like finely tuned slingshots. Our arsenal is packed with the most powerful tools in the industry, ensuring your project has the firepower it needs to succeed in the digital battlefield.

items.name: React.js
items.description: Our go-to frontend launcher, perfect for catapulting engaging user interfaces into action.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Like precision feathers on our birds, Tailwind helps us streamline and beautify with minimal effort.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: The launchpad for our React applications, providing the boost needed for server-side rendering and optimal performance.

items.name: TypeScript
items.description: Our secret weapon for keeping our code flock in formation, ensuring type safety and reducing bugs.

team.title: Meet Our Flock
team.subtitle: The angry faces behind the brilliant code
team.description: Don't let our grumpy looks fool you - we're a passionate bunch of tech enthusiasts ready to tackle any challenge. Each AngryDev brings unique skills to the nest, ensuring we have the right bird for every job.

members.name: Red
members.bio: Our fearless leader with a fiery passion for clean code and innovative solutions.

members.name: Chuck
members.bio: Lightning-fast at crafting sleek user interfaces that leave users in awe.

members.name: Bomb
members.bio: Specializes in explosive performance optimizations and rock-solid server architectures.

members.name: Matilda
members.bio: Has an eye for detail and a talent for creating user experiences that soar above the rest.

members.name: Terence
members.bio: Our resident perfectionist, ensuring every line of code meets our sky-high standards.

sections.name: Our Origin Story
sections.content: Born from the frustration of complicated IT solutions, AngryDevs emerged in Vancouver with a mission: to tackle tech challenges head-on, with the precision and power of a well-aimed angry bird. We may look grumpy, but that's just our game face!

sections.name: The AngryDevs Difference
sections.content: What sets us apart? It's our unique blend of passion, precision, and a dash of controlled chaos. We approach each project like a new level in a game - with strategy, skill, and an unwavering determination to crush it.

sections.name: Our Flock
sections.content: Our team isn't just a group of developers; we're a flock of tech enthusiasts, problem-solvers, and code-slingers. Each AngryDev brings a unique skill to the nest, ensuring we have the right bird for every job.

sections.name: Community Involvement
sections.content: We're not just about knocking down technical obstacles; we're also about building up our community. AngryDevs is proud to participate in local tech meetups, mentor budding developers, and contribute to open-source projects.
